docs.snippet: They say using the 1,200-millimeter lens is like looking at the world through a straw, so a reporter and photographer decided to find out....
docs.lead_paragraph: They say using the 1,200-millimeter lens is like looking at the world through a straw, so a reporter and photographer decided to find out.
docs.abstract: Grace Notes column; B&H Photo on Manhattan sells 1,200 millimeter camera lens that is three feet long, weighs 36 pounds and costs $180,000; its narrow focus keeps objects sharp up to eight miles.

headline.main: An Expensive View (but Hardly Expansive) of New York City
